StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertOrUpdateProgramInfo]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NWARowId uniqueiden..er, @FIPEnrolled char(1), @FIPEnrollmentDate date.me, @FAPEnrolled char(1), @FAPEnrollmentDate date.me, @MCTAPEnrolled char(1), @MCTAPEnrollmentDate date.me, @Con.den.alRemark varchar(max), @UserLogin uniqueiden..er
AS SET NOCOUNT ON
--IMPORTANT NOTE: Add begin and end transac.on
--records are updated only for the same p. date under the assump.on the user --made a mistake. Otherwise a new record is inserted so that the PFT history can -- be maintained
IF EXISTS (SELECT '1' FROM [MCRISS].[USMC].[CandidatePoolCardInfo] cpf inner join [MCRISS].[dbo].[NWA] n ON cpf.nwa_id = n.nwa_id where n.[rowguid] = @NWARowId)
BEGIN
UPDATE [MCRISS].[USMC].[CandidatePoolCardInfo] SET [FIPEnrolled] = @FIPEnrolled, [FIPEnrollmentDate] = @FIPEnrollmentDate, [FAPEnrolled] = @FAPEnrolled, [FAPEnrollmentDate] = @FAPEnrollmentDate, [MCTAPEnrolled] = @MCTAPEnrolled, [MCTAPEnrollmentDate] = @MCTAPEnrollmentDate, [Con.den.alRemark] = @Con.den.alRemark, [LastUpdateUserId] = newid(), [LastUpdateDate] = GetDate()
WHERE nwa_id = (SELECT cpf.nwa_id FROM [MCRISS].[USMC].[CandidatePoolCardInfo] cpf inner join [MCRISS].[dbo].[NWA] n ON cpf.nwa_id = n.nwa_id where n.[rowguid] = @NWARowId)
END
ELSE BEGIN
INSERT INTO [MCRISS].[USMC].[CandidatePoolCardInfo] ([NWA_ID],[FIPEnrolled] ,[FIPEnrollmentDate] ,[FAPEnrolled], [FAPEnrollmentDate] ,[MCTAPEnrolled] ,[MCTAPEnrollmentDate], [Con.den.alRemark],[LastUpdateUserId],[LastUpdateDate])
Select NWA_ID , @FIPEnrolled, @FIPEnrollmentDate, @FAPEnrolled, @FAPEnrollmentDate, @MCTAPEnrolled, @MCTAPEnrollmentDate, @Con.den.alRemark, newid(),GetDate()
from NWA n where n.rowguid = @NWARowId
END
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
